response.answer_text: Easy comes, easy goes… With this saying, you should note that there's a lot of scamming over the WWW. Just google the phrase, essay writing scam, and you'll find that out. First always google them with suffixes like scam, complain, etc. Two, try to find out their refund policy. It MUST be very clearly laid out. Always try a service by placing a smaller order. Googling can lead you to more useful information in this regard.
